channel.title: black metal on Ritual dust
channel.description: Recent content in black metal on Ritual dust

item.title: Tapes
item.description: Just listing all the tapes from my collection here Table of contents Dark ambient Synth music Metal Dungeon synth Folk Dark ambient The search for the sulphurous well, Tommy Creep Rites of blood and dust, Blood and dust Sun of serpent, moone of cipher, Them Teeth Auditory witchcraft, Them Teeth Alkemisten & vansinnet, Them Teeth Come, deathless, Surachai Hinterpest, Mumbles Synth music Sortil√®ges, Potochkine Potochkine, Potochkine The devil rides out, Dream division Surlendemain acides, Autmelodi Careful, Boy Harsher Glider 10 reworks, The Sight below ?

item.title: Black Metal December 2022
item.description: Black metal logos and symbols a day during the month of December. Arcane Chaux Vive Grim Cairn Sigil Eternal Flame Lucifer Sigil ACAB Trolls & Goblins Katabasis Abysmal Elder Sign No AI Solstice

item.title: Winter Lantern t-shirt illustration
item.description: Eldritch ink illustration made for the band Inpathos. This was made for a t-shirt design, I channelled lovecraftian horror and the aesthethics of the game Bloodborne in there.

item.title: Ossuary Wraith T-shirt Design
item.description: A large ink illustration made for the band Ossuary Wraith , designed for their merch. The frame also contains their logo which I also designed, see more details about it .

item.title: Sworn to Darkness
item.description: Woodcut style occult inspired logo for Sworn to Darkness Sworn to darkness logo and symbol In order to get a realistic woodcut style I made a linocut of the symbol first to guide the drawing of the letters, here are some photos of this process: carved linocut symbol inking and printing the linocut the printed symbol and the linocut final printed symbol

item.title: Ossuary Wraith
item.description: Ghastly bone-covered logo for the black metal band Ossuary Wraith Ossuary Wraith logo Ossuary Wraith symbol

item.title: Black Metal December 2021
item.description: As I did in 2017 , I’m making a black metal inspired typography piece every day of the month of December. Grief Systemic racism Wassail Cold Chagrin Fanghorn Dungeon Nameless dread Summoning Occult Hive Krampus Den of evil Stone Circle The Return of the Repressed Goth Resentment Veil Ruined Tower Nazgul Bog Body Chthonien

item.title: Foulest Witch
item.description: Hand-drawn logo, sigil and illustrations for Foulest Witch, a black metal, dark ambient and ritual music label. Complete logo with sigil and lettering Sigil Sigil with text Dagger and candleholder

item.title: Ariel Doom
item.description: A lettering piece made for the black metal-themed art project of a friend, see more over on her instagram . Ariel Doom logo in white on black Ariel Doom logo in black on white

item.title: Black Metal December 2017
item.description: TRVE KVLT Ruin Ritual Unreadable Doom Black mass Castle Black soul Coffee Church of the goat Cursed Damned Decay Dart Dead flowers Freezing hell Grave Grim Lore Loud and slow Minas Morgul Mirror Ofridr R'lyeh Sigil Third eye Void Yig
